events.message: The customer reported a vehicle accident that occurred at an intersection, causing damage to their car and a minor injury.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following review of the details and initial report provided by the customer.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the auto accident case and begin the claims process promptly.
The customer received confirmation that their claim has been officially acknowledged and is under active review.
The claims agent requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police reports, and medical bills related to the accident.
The customer submitted all requested documents including photos, medical reports, and official police documentation.
The insurance company started a thorough investigation to assess the extent of damage and verify the claim details.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of claim validity and assessment of repair costs for the vehicle.
The company proposed a settlement amount based on the findings, covering vehicle damages and medical expenses.
The customer expressed appreciation for the timely processing and clarity in communication regarding the settlement.
Following customer agreement, the claim was officially approved and prepared for payout to cover all expenses.
The payment was successfully processed and issued to the customerâ€™s account for repairs and medical costs.
The claim was officially closed after payment issuance and receipt confirmation from the customer.
All case documents and records were archived in the system for future reference and audit purposes.
